name: Solar Command
description:
The galaxy is at war.

Jump into a tactical card game that will pit you against factions all vying for total galactic control.

Take control of a variety of factions to ensure total galactic domination. Factions are engineered with different styles and capabilities. Choose militaristic Archleon and its horde of battleships or reign supreme with Nexus’ technological superiority. Win against your enemies in a turn-based territory system and conquer the battlefield one hex at a time. Build your fleets, expand your grounds, play your cards, and defeat the enemy. Dive into singleplayer against the computer and mold the fate of the galaxy with your might, or display your prowess against others in online multiplayer.

The galaxy is yours.
